title: Cherry and Heather
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Thai, Fast food, Take-out, Sushi, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small cafe with a good range of vegan options. Vegan soup always available, Tapa bakehouse organic bread is used, homemade vegan sushi boxes are available. Close to Cessnock subway, walking distance from the Science Centre.
